title: Tsuyokute New Saga (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Calm Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Clever Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Dragons   Elves   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Heroes   Male Protagonist   Politics   Polygamy   Romantic Subplot   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Sword And Magic   Weak to Strong
author: Masayuki Abe   阿部 正行
description: The Demon King led his army of demons to wipe out the human race. The Hero, Kyle, and his allies attack the Demon King’s castle to defeat the Demon King. The Demon King is slain, but at what cost? Kyle lost all of his allies throughout the war. Friends, family, lovers, comrades. All dead. As he lay dying at the foot of the Demon King’s chamber, he notices a strange gem that the Demon King had coveted.>
